body: I ferl bad for the author... making wahmens stupid in comics.
This is not even netorare, it is just stupidity.

Lol at all the people here complaining about NTR when they could have just blacklist and avoid it. 

@blackblade96 Netori? With that kind of MC? Keep dreaming. Do you know why there's more Netorare than Netori right now? It's because of the current trend of anime where it's nothing but beta cuck herbivore fucbois for MCs. Especially in harem ecchi animes. Sadly, those kinds of tropes are made as the MC for a reason. Even if it's a pathetic one. NTR just levels the playing field.

Pros: Wife is beautiful
Cons: Story sucks, NTR sucks.
I think the 'bbm' tag hardly qualifies. She is in good shape isn't she?
Great art, but stupid characters like the wife kinda bring down the story...
It's so nicely drawn, but it's fucking NTR.... sigh.
if only it was a netori story and he got her back id be fine with it but its a fucking netorare and it sucks make better stuff.
